title: Cyclops Vocalizations
description: Cyclops Vocalizations sound package with 176 high-quality big-monster sound effects, ready for use in game scenes, animations and trailers.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/cyclops-vocalizations-preview

Full Audio Preview: https://youtu.be/yDrT0441zn0

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/kjxoq49hk72yb2o/MSE%20-%20Cyclops%20Vocalizations.pdf?dl=0


The Cyclops is a humanoid monster of enormous size (roughly the size of a troll), with mighty strength and good agility, despite having one eye. All of its qualities formed the basis of the creature's creation and vocalization design.


The collection contains 17 voice actions, including 176 professionally designed vocalization one-shot sound effects, divided into:

  • 16 voice sounds during an attack
  • 8 battle shouts
  • 16 deaths
  • 16 growls
  • 16 pains
  • 20 roars
  • 8 snarls
  • 8 victory shouts
  • 8 exhalation sounds
  • 4 coughing sounds
  • 4 effort sounds
  • 16 groans
  • 8 idle voice sounds
  • 8 sounds when jumping
  • 4 laughing sounds
  • 8 sounds of upset
  • 8 grunting sounds


Among the attacking type of vocalizations there are both short and long ones, the pain type vocalizations also have different lengths. The voice samples are quite dry and ready for further processing. Such a variety of vocal samples can satisfy a wide variety of needs.Â 


This package is perfect for creating the voices of big-monsters: cyclops, ogre, orc, troll, giant, big troglodyte, elemental, beast, critter and other big creatures.


Using this asset, create an atmosphere for your project in the genre of fantasy, dark fantasy, horror or any other where monsters live and roar. Enjoy!


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 176 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 17 voice actions
  • 76 voice samples of the attacking type
  • 48 voice samples of the pain type
  • 52 neutral type voice samples
  • great for animations, trailers, game scenes for fantasy, dark fantasy, horror and more


Number of Audio Waves: 176

Number of Audio Cues: 176

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 4 minutes 02 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
